# Continuous testing (& delivery)

## Why do it?
>- Avoid works on my machine
>- Verify that everyones changes work
>- More faith in the product
>- Less time spent manually doing it

## Core concepts
>- Build
>- Job
>- Results

## Tools
- MS Build
- Travis CI
- Bamboo
- GitLab
